name: FROGGEST
description:
AMAZING ART BY MY DEAR FRIEND ALEXIS KIM !!!!

FOLLOW HER NOW: https://twitter.com/alexxyart

This game was made in a week!

You are a baby tadpole that came out wrong! Seek evolution by devouring your "normal" siblings before Mama Frog eats you and sends you back whence you came: her tummy.

How To Play:

You can swim around with left click, and use right click to charge up a sling shot maneuver! You win once you've eaten all your siblings and evolved into your final form, but you lose if Mama catches you with her tongue!
